title: Compare technical proposals to find the suitable proposal based on the defined criteria using Microsoft 365 Copilot
shortDescription: Compare technical proposals to find the suitable proposal based on the defined criteria using Microsoft 365 Copilot
longDescription: This prompt helps in creating a comparison with 2 proposal in tabular format. In this scenario the proposal is compared based on the following criteria, risks & challenges, secure and governed approach and value outcome. Also take recommendation from AI on the suitable proposal based on the provided criteria.
